messages.title: A FAIRER BRITAIN
messages.content: Britain needs fresh vision and leadership to restore fairness in our economy. The 'Liberal Democrats' will build an economy that works for everyone, not just the richest.

messages.title: TACKLE THE CLIMATE EMERGENCY
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats will take the urgent action needed to protect our environment, making Britain a world leader in renewable energy and green technology.

messages.title: MORE MONEY FOR OUR SCHOOLS AND NHS
messages.content: As Prime Minister, Jo Swinson will work every day to ensure every part of the UK gets its fair share of funding. Jane says if elected she wants to see more money for Wales to spend on improving our schools, NHS and other public services.

messages.title: FOR A BRIGHTER FUTURE
messages.content: Strengthening rural communities, Standing up for our farmers, Fighting for better healthcare.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Building an economy that works for everyone, not just the richest.
Urgent action to protect our environment, leading in renewable energy and green technology.
Ensure fair funding for schools in all parts of the UK.
Increase funding for NHS and improve public health services.

mentions.candidate: Jane Dodds will provide the visionary, caring leadership our area needs.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Only the Liberal Democrats can beat the Conservatives here in Brecon & Radnorshire. Remember, Labour can't win here.

issues.brexitEurope: Jane will fight for the people's vote by battling against a damaging hard Brexit.
issues.economy: Building an economy that works for everyone, not just the richest.
issues.education: More money to spend on improving our schools.
issues.environment: Take urgent action to protect our environment, making Britain a world leader in renewable energy and green technology.
issues.health: Fighting for better healthcare, increase funding for NHS.

leaflet.personalStatement: I'm determined to stop the underfunding of our healthcare services... and work tirelessly against poverty, injustice and inequality.

endorsements.endorser: Our farming unions, Jane Dodds and the Welsh Lib Dems

quotes.text: Jane will provide the visionary, caring leadership our area needs.

images.caption: Jane Dodds - A strong voice for Brecon & Radnorshire.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet suggests tactical voting by stating 'Only the Liberal Democrats can beat the Conservatives here in Brecon & Radnorshire. Remember, Labour can't win here.' It contrasts the Conservative Party's ‘uncaring cuts’, highlighting the need to vote for Jane Dodds to provide visionary, caring leadership.
